title: ICE / SOONA barks
description: Things Noid says inside the church.

dialogueTree.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""... equals equals false, close bra..."
dialogueTree.text: "... equals equals false, close brackets, equals equals true?"

dialogueTree.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""No, that's not it.""
Soona, the Programmer: "“What about... '1 <= getResult() an..."
dialogueTree.text: “What about... '1 <= getResult() and and getResult() <= getNumSides()'...?”

dialogueTree.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""What do you mean 'file not found'?""
Soona, the Programmer: ""Where did that 'Õ' come from?""
